inventorymanagement.controller

Class ItemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • inventorymanagement.controller.ItemController

  • @RestController
public class ItemController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class ItemController is a controller that handles requests for adding, updating, deleting as well as getting information of particular item as well as for all items. It also handles requests for getting count of particular item type.
    Author:
    manrajsingh

        @RequestMapping(value="/items",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
 @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
public inventorymanagement.model.ItemModel create(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                              inventorymanagement.model.IncomingItemModel itemModel,
                                                                                                                                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
                                                                                                                                                       throws inti.ws.spring.exception.client.UnauthorizedException,
                                                                                                                                                              inti.ws.spring.exception.client.BadRequestException
        Controller method to add new items
        Parameters:
        itemModel - IncomingItemModel contains Product Id and Product Tag required for creating a new item
        session - HttpSession for validating if user is admin or not
        Returns:
        ItemModel
        Throws:
        inti.ws.spring.exception.client.UnauthorizedException - Thrown when user is not logged in or not an admin
        inti.ws.spring.exception.client.BadRequestException - Thrown when any of the field is empty

 @ResponseBody

                                                                                                                                                               inti.ws.spring.exception.client.NotFoundException
        Controller method to update details of an item
        Parameters:
        id - Integer Item Id of the item that needs to be updated
        itemModel - IncomingItemModel contains Product Id and Product Tag required for updating an item
        session - HttpSession for validating if user is admin or not
        Returns:
        ItemModel
        Throws:
